attributes.action: Ask Govt to intervene that GPHC should give more than three chances to pre regs.
attributes.additional_details: The Govt should intervene and ask GPHC to re-introduce re- checking of papers and give more than 3 chances for the assessment registration exam as a pharmacist.
attributes.background: As every student spent 4 years in university amd then 1 year in the pre registration, 3 chances rule are not enough to check the suitability. As the anything can happen on the day or during the assessment. Each student deserve a better chance as they spent 5 years of studying.

rejection.details: The General Pharmaceutical Council (GPhC) is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
